nodes.bodyText: This could be Window.Cypress check. That would help us confirm if we are running tests.
Were you thinking the Window.Cypress check be in addition to (&&), instead of (completely replace current check), or an alternative to (||) looking for the token?
I think we can replace this check with Window.Cypress check. Thats the pattern that we follow in other places.
